name: pipod
short_description: This source code and corresponding documentation illustrates both the code produced and the methodology used for its conception and verification of functionality. It also explains the fundamental decisions made when constructing this project such as choice of language and hardware used. We had to carefully consider the ways in which we could make sure the source code operated in the most efficient manner possible in order to make it be more environmentally friendly by consuming the minimum amount of power possible.
summary: This code is the building blocks that this project was founded upon.
